mapper.select: select * from (select * from ads order by a_date desc) where rowNum < 10
select a.*, (select count(a_no) from reply where a_no=#{no}) as replycount from ads a where a_no=#{no}
select * from (select rowNum rn, a.* from ( select * from ads where a_category = #{a_category} order by a_date desc) a) where rn between 1 and 4
mapper.update: update ads set a_viewcount = a_viewcount+1 where a_no=#{no}
update ads set a_goodcount = a_goodcount+1 where a_no=#{like_no}
update ads set a_goodcount = a_goodcount-1 where a_no=#{del_like}
mapper.select: select a.* from ads_like al, ads a where al.l_lno=a.a_no and al.l_mid=#{m_id} order by a.a_date desc
